mapper.select:
select f.fid,s.shopid,s.shopname,s.photo,b.bid,b.truename,b.phone,s.shoptype,s.status,s.address,f.isfavorite,f.mid from favorites f,shop s,business b where f.shopid = s.shopid and s.shopid = b.shopid and f.isfavorite = 1 and f.mid = #{mid} and f.gid=0 and b.state=1
and CONCAT(s.shopname,s.shoptype) like '%' #{search} '%'

select distinct f.fid,s.shopid,g.gid,s.shopname,g.img,g.goodsname,g.price,g.goodstype,s.address,f.isfavorite,f.mid from favorites f,goods g,shop s where f.shopid = s.shopid and g.shopid=s.shopid and f.gid = g.gid and f.isfavorite = 1 and f.mid = #{mid} and f.gid <> 0 and g.isdelete=0
and CONCAT(g.goodsname,g.goodstype) like '%' #{search} '%'
order by s.shopid
